name: @fat_tract_colorize
author: AFNI Developers
description: Visualize tractographic output from 3dTrackID, particularly in probabilistic mode.

inputs.description: FA values of the DT fitting, used to modulate the brightness of the RGB coloration.
inputs.name: Input FA file

inputs.description: First eigenvector of the DT fitting. A unit vector volume with 3 components (0-1 range).
inputs.name: Input V1 file

inputs.description: The INDIMAP or PAIRMAP file output by 3dTrackID, specifying the subbrick if >1 (e.g., NAME_INDIMAP+orig'[0]').
inputs.name: Input tracts file

inputs.description: Optional underlay dataset for AFNI/SUMA viewing. Default is to use the FA dataset.
inputs.name: Input underlay file

inputs.description: Turn off auto-running of AFNI_SUMA commands to view the output immediately.
inputs.name: No view flag

inputs.description: Only view the data with AFNI+SUMA, assuming the command has been run before.
inputs.name: Only view flag

output-files.description: HSL coloration volume file with four bricks from the V1 and FA volumes: Hue, Saturation, Luminosity, and Brightness
output-files.name: Output HUE volume

output-files.description: Slightly smoothed isosurface file made by IsoSurface
output-files.name: Output isosurface

output-files.description: Projection of appropriate coloration onto the surface
output-files.name: Output projected surface
